CustomField.description:
Used to attribute when the write-off will hit. This is tied to the `Write_off_Quarter__c` formula field, which is used in our reporting.
External Systems Utilization: Retool
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to attribute when the write-off will hit. This is tied to the `Write_off_Quarter__c` formula field, which is used in our reporting.
CustomField.label: Write-off Date
